title: Agents for scientific notebooks
text:
Experiments on Agent ready jupyter notebooks using existing tools: - Pretzel AI - RO-Crate - nbdev - rdflib - ESIP Science on Schema.org
Inspired by Microsoft GraphRAG

title: Agents for scientific notebooks
text:
Install
This repository uses PDM in a .venv folder. 1. Install pdm 2. Set pdm to use .venv
pdm config python.

Install depenencies using pdm

pdm install agentic_notebook_exp
PDM will install Prezel AI and it’s version of Jupyter lab. You can start prezel lab with:
pretzel lab
